mi:PackageInformation.name: Composite.Tools.LegacyUrlHandler
mi:PackageInformation.author: Composite A/S
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Keeps track of changes to URLs on a website and maps no longer existing URLs to their new equivalents.
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: Keeps track of changes to URLs on a website and maps no longer existing URLs to their new equivalents.
